statements: SELECT * FROM foot_traffic_data WHERE foot_traffic_count > 100;
SELECT store_id, location FROM foot_traffic_data WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT location, foot_traffic_count FROM foot_traffic_data WHERE store_id = 3 ORDER BY foot_traffic_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM foot_traffic_data WHERE foot_traffic_count BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM foot_traffic_data;
SELECT * FROM foot_traffic_data WHERE foot_traffic_count > 100 ORDER BY date DESC, store_id ASC
SELECT store_id, location FROM foot_traffic_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY location
SELECT location, SUM(foot_traffic_count) AS total_traffic FROM foot_traffic_data GROUP BY location HAVING total_traffic > 500 ORDER BY total_traffic DESC
SELECT date, AVG(foot_traffic_count) AS avg_traffic FROM foot_traffic_data GROUP BY date ORDER BY date
SELECT * FROM foot_traffic_data WHERE location LIKE '%mall%' ORDER BY store_id
SELECT * FROM foot_traffic_data ORDER BY date DESC, hour ASC, minute ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT store_id, number_of_customers FROM foot_traffic_data WHERE hour = 12 AND entrance_area = 1;
SELECT address, phone_number FROM store_locations WHERE manager_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT store_id, date, number_of_customers FROM foot_traffic_data WHERE number_of_customers > 50 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM foot_traffic_data WHERE hour IN (8, 9, 10) AND entrance_area = 2 ORDER BY hour ASC, minute ASC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM foot_traffic_data WHERE store_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT store_name, address, phone_number FROM store_locations WHERE manager_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT store_id, date, hour, minute, number_of_customers FROM foot_traffic_data WHERE number_of_customers > 100 ORDER BY date ASC, hour DESC;
SELECT store_name, address, manager_name FROM store_locations WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%';
SELECT store_id, date, hour, number_of_customers, entrance_area FROM foot_traffic_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND entrance_area IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY number_of_customers DESC, date ASC;
SELECT * FROM store_locations;
SELECT store_name, city, state FROM store_locations;
SELECT address, city, zipcode FROM store_locations WHERE state = 'CA';
SELECT * FROM foot_traffic_data ORDER BY date DESC, visitors_count ASC;
SELECT location_id, revenue FROM store_performance WHERE foot_traffic_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM store_locations;
SELECT store_name, city, state FROM store_locations WHERE zipcode='12345';
SELECT location_id, store_name, address, city, state, zipcode FROM store_locations ORDER BY store_name DESC;
SELECT location_id, store_name, address, city, state, zipcode FROM store_locations WHERE city='New York' AND state='NY';

SELECT s.location_id, s.store_name, p.revenue, f.visitors_count FROM store_locations s JOIN store_performance p ON s.location_id = p.location_id JOIN foot_traffic_data f ON s.location_id = f.location_id WHERE p.revenue > 1000 AND f.visitors_count > 50 ORDER BY p.revenue DESC, f.visitors_count ASC;
SELECT * FROM FootTrafficData WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT store_name, location_lat, location_long FROM StoreLocations WHERE store_id = 2;
SELECT manager_name, store_type FROM StoreDetails WHERE store_id = 3;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_type, analysis_result FROM StoreAnalytics WHERE store_id = 4;
SELECT timestamp, customer_count FROM FootTrafficData WHERE store_id = 5;
SELECT store_id, timestamp, customer_count FROM FootTrafficData WHERE customer_count > 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT store_id, store_name, location_lat, location_long FROM StoreLocations WHERE location_lat > 40.0 AND location_long < -70.0 ORDER BY store_name ASC;
SELECT store_id, manager_name, store_type FROM StoreDetails WHERE store_type = 'Sports' AND store_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY store_id;
SELECT store_id, analysis_id, analysis_type, analysis_result FROM StoreAnalytics WHERE store_id = 2 ORDER BY analysis_id DESC;
SELECT store_id, manager_name, store_type FROM StoreDetails WHERE manager_name <> 'John Doe' ORDER BY store_type, manager_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM store_locations;
SELECT store_name, city, state FROM store_locations WHERE state='California';
SELECT store_name, address, city, zipcode FROM store_locations ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM store_locations;
SELECT store_name, city, state, zipcode FROM store_locations WHERE city='New York' AND state='New York';
SELECT * FROM store_locations;
SELECT store_id, store_name, city FROM store_locations WHERE state='California';
SELECT store_id, store_name, city, state, zipcode FROM store_locations ORDER BY city ASC, store_id DESC;
SELECT store_id, store_name, address, city FROM store_locations WHERE zipcode LIKE '9%' AND state='New York';
SELECT s.store_id, s.store_name, s.address, f.date, f.time, f.num_customers FROM store_locations s INNER JOIN foot_traffic_data f ON s.store_id = f.store_id ORDER BY f.date DESC, f.time DESC;
